Package Controller

Class RoomController

java.lang.Object
Controller.RoomController
public class RoomController extends Object
RoomController contains all the methods required by the entity class Room and the UI class RoomUI
Since:
2022-04-12
Version:
1.0
Author:
Loke Kah Hou

    Method to display the room UI for the staff to add, make changes or print out using methods defined in the room controller

    Method to initialize the room based on the text file into the roomList
    The details in the text file will be in the following format:
    Room Number, Bed Type, Room Type, Room Status, Wifi Availability, View Availability, Smoking Rule, Price
    If there are files that do not exist or are in the wrong format, the error message will be printed.

    • getRoomList

      public static ArrayList<Room> getRoomList()
      Gets the roomList of the hotel
      Returns:
      this Hotel's list of rooms

    • setRoomList

      public static void setRoomList(ArrayList<Room> rL)
      Sets the roomList of the hotel.
      Parameters:
      rL - An array list containing Room objects.

    • createRoom

      public static void createRoom(String roomNum, int bedType, int roomType, int status, int wifi, int view, int smoking)
      Creates a new room with the various attributes
      Parameters:
      roomNum - This Room's room number
      bedType - This Room's available bed type
      roomType - This Room's type
      status - This Room's status
      wifi - This Room's WIFI availability
      view - This Room's availability of a view
      smoking - This Room's smoking rule

    • updateRoomStatus

      public static void updateRoomStatus(int index, int choice)
      Method for a staff to update the Room Status of a particular room
      Method is accessed using the RoomUI
      Parameters:
      index - The particular index of the room in the ArrayList Room
      choice - The choice that the staff has made

    • updateBedType

      public static void updateBedType(int index, int choice)
      Method for a staff to update the Bed Type of a particular room
      Method is accessed using the RoomUI
      Parameters:
      index - The particular index of the room in the ArrayList Room
      choice - The choice that the staff has made

      public static void updateSmoking(int index, int choice)
      Method for a staff to update the Smoking Rule of a particular room
      Method is accessed using the RoomUI
      Parameters:
      index - The particular index of the room in the ArrayList Room
      choice - The choice that the staff has made

    • searchRoom

      public static int searchRoom(String roomNumber)
      This method compares the staff's room number input with the room numbers of the rooms in the array list RoomsList
      Parameters:
      roomNumber - The staff's room number input
      Returns:
      the index of the room in the array list RoomsList if search is successful, else it would return -1

    • printRoomStatus

      public static void printRoomStatus(String roomNumber)
      This method prints the room status of the room.
      If the room is not found, an error message would be produced.
      Parameters:
      roomNumber - The staff's room number input

    • printRoomStatusReport

      public static void printRoomStatusReport()
      Method calls the staff to either input 1 for the Occupancy Report by Room Type or 2 for the Occupancy Report by Room Status

    • printRoomReportByType

      public static String printRoomReportByType(int i)
      Calls the relevant method based on the integer i
      Parameters:
      i - represents the choice within the print statement of the printRoomStatusReport() function
      Returns:
      the string generated by the called method

    • printAllVacant

      public static String printAllVacant()
      Generates the string of the the number of vacant rooms and the respective room numbers
      Returns:
      the print statement of the number of vacant rooms and the respective room numbers

      public static String printAllOccupied()
      Generates the string of the the number of occupied rooms and the respective room numbers
      Returns:
      the print statement of the number of occupied rooms and the respective room numbers

    • numberOfVacantByRoomType

      public static int numberOfVacantByRoomType(Room.RoomType roomType)
      Method to calculate the number of Vacant Rooms in the specific Room Type requested
      Parameters:
      roomType - The requested Room Type by the user
      Returns:
      the number of vacant rooms that have the room type.

    • printVacantRoomsList

      public static String printVacantRoomsList(Room.RoomType type)
      Method to make a string of the list of rooms of a certain room type that are vacant
      Parameters:
      type - The requested Room Type by the user
      Returns:
      the string that indicates the rooms of a certain room type that are vacant

    • printRoomOccupancyRate

      public static String printRoomOccupancyRate(Room.RoomType type)
      Method to get a string of the number of vacant rooms per the requested Room Type
      Parameters:
      type - The requested Room Type by the user
      Returns:
      the string that indicates the number of rooms of a requested Room Type that are vacant

    • initRoom

      public static void initRoom()
      Method to initialize the room based on the text file into the roomList
      The details in the text file will be in the following format:
      Room Number, Bed Type, Room Type, Room Status, Wifi Availability, View Availability, Smoking Rule, Price
      If there are files that do not exist or are in the wrong format, the error message will be printed.

    • saveRoom

      public static void saveRoom()
      Method to save any changes made to the room by the staff
      If the room has not been saved successfully, then the error message would be printed

    • displayPage

      public static void displayPage()
      Method to display the room UI for the staff to add, make changes or print out using methods defined in the room controller

    • toVacant

      public static void toVacant(String roomNumber)
      This method changes this Room's status to RESERVED if Reservation has been confirmed Else, this Room's status will be VACANT
      Parameters:
      roomNumber - The room number inputted in by the staff Will be in the format of xx-yy xx represents the floor number from 02-07 yy represents the room number on the floor from 01-08

    • getRoom

      public static Room getRoom(String roomNum)
      This method takes in the room number inputted by the staff.
      Calls the searchRoom function to get the index of the room in the room list
      If no room has been found, an error message would be printed.
      Parameters:
      roomNum - The room number inputted in by the staff Will be in the format of xx-yy xx represents the floor number from 02-07 yy represents the room number on the floor from 01-08
      Returns:
      the Room to the user with its specific details

    • displayVacantRoomsByType

      public static void displayVacantRoomsByType(Room.RoomType type)
      This method displays the vacant rooms of the specific room type requested by the staff
      If the room type matches and the room status is vacant, the printRoomDetails function will be called and the individual room will be printed
      Parameters:
      type - The requested Room Type by the user

    • displayAllRoomsByType

      public static void displayAllRoomsByType(Room.RoomType type)
      This method displays all the rooms of the specific room type requested by the staff
      If the room type matches, the printRoomDetails function will be called and the individual room will be printed
      Parameters:
      type - The requested Room Type by the user

    • scanRoomType

      public static Room.RoomType scanRoomType()
      This method lets the staff choose a specific room type requested by the Reservation Controller
      Returns:
      the room type to the staff

    • scanRoomNumber

      public static String scanRoomNumber()
      This method will ask for the room number in the following format
      The room number inputted in by the staff Will be in the format of xx-yy xx represents the floor number from 02-07 yy represents the room number on the floor from 01-08
      If the room number is incorrectly formatted or does not match, the error message would be produced
      Returns:
      the room number of the Room

    • checkRoomExist

      public static boolean checkRoomExist(String roomNumber)
      Method to check if the room exists
      Parameters:
      roomNumber - The room number inputted in by the user
      Returns:
      true IF the room exists in the room list. ELSE it return false
